analysis.description:
BasicMultiToken._mint (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#344-358) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokens[i].transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_tokenAmounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#352-354)

BasicMultiToken.burnSome (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#362-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-someTokens[i].transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#372-373)

MultiToken.change (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#418-435) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_fromToken).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#427-431)
	-ERC20(_toToken).transfer(msg.sender,returnAmount) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc627b23b5fa02aef1aa35b868309acac7f463580.sol#431-432)
